CustomField.formula: IF ( Call_Duration_Sub__c > 0, (FLOOR(Call_Duration_Sub__c) * 24 * 60) + (FLOOR( 24 * ( Call_Duration_Sub__c - FLOOR(Call_Duration_Sub__c) )) * 60) + (ROUND(60 * (ROUND( 24 * ( Call_Duration_Sub__c - FLOOR(Call_Duration_Sub__c) ),8) - FLOOR(ROUND( 24 * ( Call_Duration_Sub__c - FLOOR(Call_Duration_Sub__c) ),8)) ),0)) , 0)
CustomField.label: Call Duration
